name: amnesiac-monorepo
description: Amnesiac - Blood on the Clocktower PWA and Session Management API

scripts.build:all: npm run build:web && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/web && npm run lint --workspace=apps/server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/web && npm run lint:fix --workspace=apps/server
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=apps/web && npm run test --workspace=apps/server
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist node_modules

author: AbstractDevs
